|default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.20 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui=00:15:6D |oui_eth=00:15:6D }} [http://www.ubnt.com/ls2 Product page] :[http://dl.ubnt.com/ls2_datasheet.pdf Datasheet] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Ubiquiti/LiteStation2 On the OpenWrt wiki], w/ some additional info in the [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/nanostation NanoStation entry]
{{TechInfoDepot|Ubiquiti_Networks_LiteStation2}} Per '''Ubiquiti''''s datasheet... *The dimensions of the board are ~ [[Dimensions::106.7 mm x 88.9 mm x 15.24 mm|106.7 mm (L) x 88.9 mm (W) x 15.24 (H)]]. [http://www.ubnt.com/compliance Ubiquiti's FCC ID list] '''UBNT''''s site specifies the usable DC voltage range as 5 to 24V. The box (of an older unit, probably) specifies the range as 5 to 18V w/ a warning not to exceed 18V. ==Images== [[File:Ubiquiti_LiteStation2.png]] [[Has images::external| ]]
